name: Learning Object Metadata (LOM) Java API
short_description: This is a Java API binding of the IEEE LTSC LOM (Learning Object Metadata) specification.  It defines an implementation neutral Java interface for the LOM, as well as providing a default implementation of that interface, and XML marshalling functionality
